==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''Bubble Spit:''' Shoots a [[bubble]] at the player, dealing '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} and trapping the player on hit. This bubble will also trap other small enemies and apply the {{Color|Hydro|Wet}} status to them on hit.
**This attack has a high chance of failing, in which case it will trap itself in the bubble instead.
*'''Bump:''' Bumps into the player, dealing '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
